methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetBlock
methods.description: Returns the block with the specified CID.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetBlockMessages
methods.description: Returns all messages from the specified block.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetEvents
methods.description: Returns the events under the given event AMT root CID.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetFinalizedTipSet
methods.description: Returns the latest F3 finalized tipset, or falls back to EC finality if F3 is not operational on the node or if the F3 finalized tipset is further back than EC finalized tipset.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetMessage
methods.description: Returns the message with the specified CID.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetParentMessages
methods.description: Returns the messages included in the blocks of the parent tipset.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetParentReceipts
methods.description: Returns the message receipts included in the blocks of the parent tipset.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetPath
methods.description: Returns the path between the two specified tipsets.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetTipSet
methods.description: Returns the tipset with the specified CID.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetTipSetAfterHeight
methods.description:
Looks back and returns the tipset at the specified epoch.
    If there are no blocks at the given epoch,
    returns the first non-nil tipset at a later epoch.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainGetTipSetByHeight
methods.description: Returns the tipset at the specified height.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainHasObj
methods.description: Checks if a given CID exists in the chain blockstore.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainHead
methods.description: Returns the chain head (heaviest tipset).

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainReadObj
methods.description: Reads IPLD nodes referenced by the specified CID from the chain blockstore and returns raw bytes.

methods.name: Filecoin.ChainTipSetWeight
methods.description: Returns the weight of the specified tipset.

methods.name: Filecoin.GasEstimateFeeCap
methods.description: Returns the estimated fee cap for the given parameters.

methods.name: Filecoin.GasEstimateGasLimit
methods.description: Returns the estimated gas limit for the given parameters.

methods.name: Filecoin.GasEstimateGasPremium
methods.description: Returns the estimated gas premium for the given parameters.

methods.name: Filecoin.GasEstimateMessageGas
methods.description: Returns the estimated gas for the given parameters.

methods.name: Filecoin.GetActorEventsRaw
methods.description: Returns all user-programmed and built-in actor events that match the given filter. Results may be limited by MaxFilterResults, MaxFilterHeightRange, and the node's available historical data.

methods.name: Filecoin.MinerCreateBlock
methods.description: Fills and signs a block template on behalf of the given miner, returning a suitable block header.

methods.name: Filecoin.MinerGetBaseInfo
methods.description: Retrieves the Miner Actor at the given address and tipset, returning basic information such as power and mining eligibility.

methods.name: Filecoin.MpoolBatchPush
methods.description: Adds a set of signed messages to the message pool.

methods.name: Filecoin.MpoolBatchPushUntrusted
methods.description: Adds a set of messages to the message pool with additional verification checks.

methods.name: Filecoin.MpoolGetNonce
methods.description: Returns the current nonce for the specified address.

methods.name: Filecoin.MpoolPending
methods.description: Returns the pending messages for a given tipset.

methods.name: Filecoin.MpoolPush
methods.description: Adds a signed message to the message pool.

methods.name: Filecoin.MpoolPushMessage
methods.description: Assigns a nonce, signs, and pushes a message to the mempool.

methods.name: Filecoin.MpoolPushUntrusted
methods.description: Adds a message to the message pool with verification checks.

methods.name: Filecoin.MpoolSelect
methods.description: Returns a list of pending messages for inclusion in the next block.

methods.name: Filecoin.NetAddrsListen
methods.description: Returns a list of listening addresses and the peer ID.

methods.name: Filecoin.NetAgentVersion
methods.description: Returns the agent version string.

methods.name: Filecoin.NetConnect
methods.description: Connects to a specified peer.

methods.name: Filecoin.NetDisconnect
methods.description: Disconnects from the specified peer.

methods.name: Filecoin.NetPeers
methods.description: Returns a list of currently connected peers.

methods.name: Filecoin.NetProtectAdd
methods.description: Protects a peer from having its connection(s) pruned in the event the libp2p host reaches its maximum number of peers.

methods.name: Filecoin.NetProtectList
methods.description: Returns the current list of protected peers.

methods.name: Filecoin.NetProtectRemove
methods.description: Remove a peer from the protected list.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateAccountKey
methods.description: Returns the public key address for the given ID address (secp and bls accounts).

methods.name: Filecoin.StateCall
methods.description: Runs the given message and returns its result without persisting changes. The message is applied to the tipset's parent state.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateCirculatingSupply
methods.description: Returns the exact circulating supply of Filecoin at the given tipset.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateDealProviderCollateralBounds
methods.description: Returns the minimum and maximum collateral a storage provider can issue, based on deal size and verified status.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetActor
methods.description: Returns the nonce and balance for the specified actor.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetAllAllocations
methods.description: Returns all allocations available in the verified registry actor.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetAllClaims
methods.description: Returns all claims available in the verified registry actor.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetAllocation
methods.description: Returns the allocation for a given address and allocation ID.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetAllocationForPendingDeal
methods.description: Returns the allocation for the specified pending deal. Returns null if no pending allocation is found.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetAllocationIdForPendingDeal
methods.description: Returns the allocation ID for the specified pending deal.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetAllocations
methods.description: Returns all allocations for a given client.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetBeaconEntry
methods.description: Returns the beacon entries for the specified epoch.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetClaim
methods.description: Returns the claim for a given address and claim ID.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetClaims
methods.description: Returns all claims for a given provider.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetNetworkParams
methods.description: Returns current network parameters.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetRandomnessDigestFromBeacon
methods.description: Samples the beacon for randomness.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetRandomnessDigestFromTickets
methods.description: Samples the chain for randomness.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetRandomnessFromBeacon
methods.description: Returns the beacon entry for the specified Filecoin epoch. If unavailable, the call blocks until it becomes available.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateGetRandomnessFromTickets
methods.description: Samples the chain for randomness.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateListActors
methods.description: Returns the addresses of every actor in the state.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateListMessages
methods.description: Returns all messages with a matching to or from address up to the given height.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateListMiners
methods.description: Returns the addresses of every miner with claimed power in the Power Actor.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateLookupID
methods.description: Retrieves the ID address of the given address.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateLookupRobustAddress
methods.description: Returns the public key address for non-account addresses (e.g., multisig, miners).

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMarketBalance
methods.description: Returns the Escrow and Locked balances of the specified address in the Storage Market.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMarketDeals
methods.description: Returns information about every deal in the Storage Market.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMarketParticipants
methods.description: Returns the Escrow and Locked balances of all participants in the Storage Market.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMarketStorageDeal
methods.description: Returns information about the specified deal.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerActiveSectors
methods.description: Returns information about sectors actively proven by a given miner.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerAllocated
methods.description: Returns a bitfield containing all sector numbers marked as allocated to the provided miner ID.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerAvailableBalance
methods.description: Returns the portion of a miner's balance available for withdrawal or spending.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerDeadlines
methods.description: Returns all proving deadlines for the given miner.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerFaults
methods.description: Returns a bitfield of the faulty sectors for the given miner.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerInfo
methods.description: Returns information about the specified miner.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerInitialPledgeCollateral
methods.description: Returns the initial pledge collateral for the specified miner's sector.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerPartitions
methods.description: Returns all partitions in the specified deadline.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerPower
methods.description: Returns the power of the specified miner.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerPreCommitDepositForPower
methods.description: Returns the sector precommit deposit for the specified miner.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerProvingDeadline
methods.description: Calculates the deadline and related details for a given epoch during a proving period.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerRecoveries
methods.description: Returns a bitfield of recovering sectors for the given miner.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerSectorAllocated
methods.description: Checks if a sector number is marked as allocated.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerSectorCount
methods.description: Returns the number of sectors in a miner's sector and proving sets.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateMinerSectors
methods.description: Returns information about the given miner's sectors. If no filter is provided, all sectors are included.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateNetworkVersion
methods.description: Returns the network version at the given tipset.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateReadState
methods.description: Returns the state of the specified actor.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateReplay
methods.description: Replays a given message, assuming it was included in a block in the specified tipset.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateSearchMsg
methods.description: Returns the receipt and tipset the specified message was included in.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateSectorExpiration
methods.description: Returns the epoch at which the specified sector will expire.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateSectorGetInfo
methods.description: Returns on-chain information for the specified miner's sector. Returns null if not found. Use StateSectorExpiration for accurate expiration epochs.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateSectorPartition
methods.description: Finds the deadline/partition for the specified sector.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateSectorPreCommitInfo
methods.description: Returns the PreCommit information for the specified miner's sector. Returns null if not precommitted.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateVMCirculatingSupplyInternal
methods.description: Returns an approximation of Filecoin's circulating supply at the given tipset.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateVerifiedClientStatus
methods.description: Returns the data cap for the given address. Returns null if no entry exists in the data cap table.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateVerifiedRegistryRootKey
methods.description: Returns the address of the Verified Registry's root key.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateVerifierStatus
methods.description: Returns the data cap for the given address.

methods.name: Filecoin.StateWaitMsg
methods.description: StateWaitMsg searches up to limit epochs for a message in the chain. If not found, it blocks until the message appears on-chain and reaches the required confidence depth.

methods.name: Filecoin.SyncSubmitBlock
methods.description: Submits a newly created block to the network.

methods.name: Filecoin.WalletBalance
methods.description: Returns the balance of a wallet.

methods.name: Filecoin.WalletHas
methods.description: Indicates whether the given address exists in the wallet.

methods.name: Filecoin.WalletList
methods.description: Returns a list of all addresses in the wallet.

methods.name: Filecoin.WalletSign
methods.description: Signs the given bytes using the specified address.

methods.name: Filecoin.WalletSignMessage
methods.description: Signs the given message using the specified address.

Expiration.description: The epoch at which the beneficiary's rights expire and revert to the owner

Quota.description: The total amount the current beneficiary can withdraw. Monotonic, but reset when beneficiary changes.

UsedQuota.description: The amount of quota the current beneficiary has already withdrawn

QualityAdjPower.description: Sum of quality adjusted power for a miner's sectors.

RawBytePower.description: Sum of raw byte power for a miner's sectors.

MarketBalance.description: External format for returning market balance from state.

Activation.description: Epoch during which the sector proof was accepted

DailyFee.description:
The total fee payable per day for this sector. The value of this field is set at the time of
sector activation, extension and whenever a sector's `QAP` is changed. This fee is payable for
the lifetime of the sector and is aggregated in the deadline's `daily_fee` field.

This field is not included in the serialized form of the struct prior to the activation of
FIP-0100, and is added as the 16th element of the array after that point only for new sectors
or sectors that are updated after that point. For old sectors, the value of this field will
always be zero.

DealWeight.description: Integral of active deals over sector lifetime

ExpectedDayReward.description:
Expected one day projection of reward for sector computed at activation
time

ExpectedStoragePledge.description:
Expected twenty day projection of reward for sector computed at
activation time

Expiration.description: Epoch during which the sector expires

InitialPledge.description: Pledge collected to commit this sector

PowerBaseEpoch.description: Epoch at which this sector's power was most recently updated

SealProof.description: The seal proof type implies the PoSt proofs

VerifiedDealWeight.description: Integral of active verified deals over sector lifetime
